Posts.Content: Hello i'm Mark i'm 15 years. I have noticed that recently i have had a dull aching feeling in my testicles. So I decided to check and i found a acorn sized lump that is atached to the front of my left testicle. i know it's not normal because my right one is fine. I need to know what it is and what to do now, can someone please help.
Posts.Title: Help i think i have prostate cancer

Posts.Content: Ok thanks, I will take you advice and go see a doctor.
Posts.Title: Help i think i have prostate cancer
